short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of metal filing and storage cabinets in Ottawa
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of metal filing and storage cabinets to Ottawa, ON by December 15, 2023.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Notice**
================.pipe
 
Reference: **2024-00284**
-------------------------

**Preliminary Information**

This notice serves as an invitation to tender for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency's (CFIA) requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of metal filing and storage cabinets to Ottawa, ON. The contract period is expected to commence on September 29, 2023, and conclude on December 15, 2023.

**Notice Details**

* Reference Number: **2024-00284**
* Solicitation Number: **2024-00284**
* Amendment Number: **1**
* Publication Date: September 1, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 15, 2023, at 14:00 (2:00 pm)
* Amendment Date: September 15, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 29, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: December 15, 2023

**Pre-conditions and Instructions**

This tender invitation cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number **2024-00284**, dated August 11, 2023, which had a closing date of August 25, 2023.

Previous bidders who responded to the previous solicitation are encouraged to update their responses with relevant changes and modifications before re-submitting.

All tender documents and relevant information are available via the Canada Buys portal: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)

**Technical Requirements**

The requirement is for the delivery and installation of metal filing and storage cabinets, categorized under UN/CEFACT Codes: **56101520** (Lockers) and UN/CEFACT Description: Lockers, per the PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The bid evaluation will be based on the **lowest price** of received proposals.

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Agreement.

**Contact Information**

For any questions and concerns, please contact:

Catherine Clairoux
Email: [catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 596-9265

Attributes and Requirements 
---------------------------
